More of the same, but still enjoyable.

Half-Life 2: Episode 2 is the sequel to HL2: Episode 1, which is itself is a sequel to the original Half-Life 2. This installment of the Half-Life series extends the story left off from Episode 1. Gordon Freeman and Alyx Vance, have escaped City 17 and are Curren;y trekking inside White Forest, towards a Resistance Base.

Gameplay wise, is more of the same type of gameplay from last two games, however, there are new features such as the new Muscle Car vehicle, and a few more enemy types. The games seems to stand apart due to its environment, with around 90% of the game having a more nature-like maps and less of the huge industrial/cramped building spaces. 

Next with the Story, It really expands the world of Half-Life much more, with the bigger area discover and referencing the Portal series with Aperture Science. It also leaves unfortunately on a cliff-hanger and, memes aside, it has been quite a while since this game was released, hopefully with Valve collaborating on Artifact and the Announcement of Valve possibly creating more games, perhaps we might get the sequel we've have wanted.

Overall, Half-Life 2 Episode 2, While not containing much new gameplay, is still a fun ride to experience and continue the story of Gordon Freeman. unfortunately, this is a last game made in the Half-Life series, hopefully it will get a revival, someday.

out of all the half-life 2 games, this one has got to be the worst. It is just so boring, the majority of it is just going around a cave. And the second to last chapter is just really bad because you have to destroy like 10 big spider things and its just really boring. I wouldn't purchase this game separately to the valve bundle, purely because it was just boring. Personally, I am glad that they haven't made a half-life 2: Episode three because I know that I wouldn't enjoy it. People also complain that it is on a cliffhanger, but I can barerly remeber the ending and I finished it less than 5 minuits ago.

En esta entrega, empezamos en el tren donde escapamos el cual ha sido derribado, en la ciudadela de ciudad 17 ahora hay un portal de energía gigante la cual hace explosiones y Alyx mientras tanto se comunica con su padre para poder entregarle el mensaje que grabó Eli ya que contiene los datos para abrir y cerrar el portal. Entonces Gordon y Alyx emprenden el viaje hacia white forest donde están fabricando un cohete el cual cerrará dicho portal pero de camino se van encontrando obstáculos y a la misma Alianza, los cuales persiguen a los dos protagonistas con el fin de que no puedan entregar dicho mensaje.

This like all half life games is a masterpeice, i just love the atmosphere. I dont know what it is about valve games but the story and the way the story is told its amazing. If i must be truthful these games have made me despise cut sences because i love the ability to see the story from gordons eyes. All the sences you can do what you want if you really wanted to but i love to admire the story as its being shown in front of me instead of making you watch an annoying cutsence. That is forced to you instead with half life 2 or all of the half life games. Theres not one cutsence other then the gman ones but i love those cutsences.

Le dernier opus de l'une des meilleurs saga de jeux auquel j'ai eu l'occasion de jouer et l'une des meilleurs tout simplement. Encore une fois le jeux est moins long que Half-Life 1 ou le 2 (une dizaine d'heures au max) mais il est aussi bien que ses prédecesseurs. A tout les niveaux, graphismes, scénario, le gampelay n'a pas changer ni les personnages à par un nouveau venu dans l'équipe de scientifique ainsi qu'un tragique incident sur la toute fin. Cela nous laisse l'espoir d'une suite mais à ce jour toujours rien, personnellement je suis près à attendre lomgtemps et ce avec impatience.
The finest of wines in PC gaming. pt. 2
